abstract: In what amounts to a break from long tradition, CNN has decided to follow President Obama’s State of the Union Address with both the official Republican response and what is being labeled the Tea Party response.
snippet: In what amounts to a break from long tradition, CNN has decided to follow President Obama’s State of the Union Address with both the official Republican response and what is being labeled the Tea Party response.
lead_paragraph: 6:36 p.m. | Updated Michele Bachmann and the Tea Party will get the full treatment of a live official response to the State of the Union Address on CNN tonight, though the other two national cable news channels say they will not carry her remarks live on television.

headline.main: Tea Party Response to Air Live on CNN
